name: Organization
description: Superclass: Organizations represent a kind of Agent corresponding to social institutions such as companies; societies; etc

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: basedAtLocation
columns.description: Reference to the Location where the Organization is based at or headquartered

columns.name: contactPersons
columns.description: References to Actors (Person; NonHumanActor) acting as contacts

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: otherIdentifiers
columns.description: Details about any other identifier; depending on the context of use

columns.name: name
columns.description: Human-understandable name of object depending on the context

columns.name: shortName
columns.description: Short name of the Organization if any
